text: Robert Pulfer (born 2 October 1967) is a Canadian former cyclist. He competed in the team time trial event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Canada Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vernon, British Columbia Category:Sportspeople from British Columbia
title: Robert Pulfer
